altername_name: Diqiu Fangwei Zhan: The Earth Defend
Dìqiú Fángwèi Zhàn: The Earth Defend
name: Earth Defense
overview: Earth Defense (aka: The Earth Defend) is an unlicensed game for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis; it was developed by AV Artisan and published by Realtec in both North America and Taiwan, without a license from Sega.
